abstract: Three of four people who had been hospitalized in critical condition following building explosion in New York City's East Village neighborhood are released; remaining patient is upgraded to good condition.
lead_paragraph: The one remaining patient from the blast and buildings collapse in the East Village has been upgraded to good condition at Bellevue Hospital Center.

headline.main: 3 Injured in East Village Explosion Are Released From Hospital
headline.print_headline: 3 Hurt in Blast Are Out of the Hospital

snippet: The one remaining patient from the blast and buildings collapse in the East Village has been upgraded to good condition at Bellevue Hospital Center.
